text: Peter Rabbit is a media franchise from Columbia Pictures and based on Beatrix Potter's 1902 of the same name. It includes two feature films. == Movies == ===Peter Rabbit (2018)=== Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden. ===Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway (2021)=== Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family. == Characters == Characters Films Peter Rabbit (2018) Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway (2021) Peter Rabbit James Corden Benjamin Bunny Colin Moody Flopsy Rabbit Margot Robbie Mopsy Rabbit Elizabeth Debicki Cottontail Rabbit Daisy Ridley Aimee Horne Bea McGregor Rose Byrne Thomas McGregor Domhnall Gleeson Pigling Bland Ewen Leslie Tommy Brock Sam Neill Mr. Jeremy Fisher Domhnall Gleeson Jemima Puddle-Duck Rose Byrne Mrs. Tiggy-Winkle Sia Felix D'eer Christian Gazal Matt Villa Johnny Town-Mouse David Wenham Mr. Tod Fayssal Bazzi Stuart Alves JW Rooster II Will Reichelt Mrs. Josephine Rabbit Rachel Ward Mr. Rabbit Bryan Brown Mr. McGregor Sam Neill Harrods General Manager Marianne Jean-Baptiste Barnabas Lennie James Samuel Whiskers Rupert Degas Tom Kitten Damon Herriman Mittens Hayley Atwell Category:Peter Rabbit (movie series) Category:Media franchises
